thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Pauline Davies-Griffith
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Pauline Davies-Griffith

author: Pauline Davies-Griffith
title: Pauline Davies-Griffith
text: I have made approximately 10 purchases from Ruby Lane sellers since I discovered the site about 6 months ago. Loving all things antique, I have enjoyed checking the site regularly and finding some lovely treasures. All purchases have been promptly sent from the seller and have arrived in good condition. All purchases have matched their detailed descriptions and photographs exactly. Being unfamiliar with buying online for anything, I was a little hesitant making my first purchase but after several purchases I have no problems recommending Ruby Lane to anyone who appreciates antiques.
